excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
Rating: Mature
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Harry Potter & Tom Riddle | Voldemort
Characters: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Hermione Granger
Additional Tags: Dark, no really, Psychological Torture, Manipulation, Mind Games, Mindfuck, Mind Manipulation, Stockholm Syndrome, Brainwashing, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Voldemort Wins
Summary:

Harry, Ron, and Hermione never escaped Malfoy Manor, six months later and Harry’s no longer sure of how much of his life was really his or what the hell is going on.

Hello everyone!

I wrote a thing for the Tomarry Halloween Exchange.

Check it out please?

summary: A curious thought someone has probably already had...
body:
A curious thought someone has probably already had…

I’m reading the HP series again currently on the Philosphers Stone chapter ‘Diagon Alley’. I’m at the part where Harry is getting his wand.

And it’s occurred to me that maybe his wand didn’t actually choose Harry. When you think about it, the twin wand, the one sold first, chose Tom Riddle. And while not all wands are the same, the CORE of the twin wands came from the same Phoenix. Perhaps the twin wand that ‘chose’ Harry was actually choosing the bit of Toms soul IN Harry and not Harry himself. Which begs the question what Harry’s own PERSONAL wand would have been had it not been for the horcrux..?

I don’t know. It’s 2am and it was a sudden thought. I’m tired.

blog.description: I’m a 17 year Fangirl, I’m a table tennis playing flautist, Whovian, Halfblooded Hufflepuff, Ranger’s apprentice, Shadowhunting Avenger that’s divergent and survived the Maze and the Huger games. Who is quite a fan of Broadway despite living in Australia? I've also got FND making me legally blind and in a wheelchair amongst other symptoms. I’m not a great drawer but if anyone DMs me I’m happy to attempt any picture requests.

summary: Flame Trees
title: Flame Trees
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qDAPHv

by Elemtee

Remus was a detective, working on taking down a major crime gang. When the operation goes wrong and his wife ends up dead at the hands of the same gang, Remus packs up his son and flees the city.

Remus plans to settle down, live a quiet life and raise his son (oh god, how will he ever manage this alone?). He didn’t plan for the residents Godric’s Hollow to turn his life on its head all over again

Words: 878, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black, Nymphadora Tonks, Teddy Lupin, Lily Evans Potter, James Potter, Peter Pettigrew, Euphemia Potter, Fleamont Potter, Harry Potter
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Remus Lupin/Nymphadora Tonks
  • Additional Tags: Character Death, Death scene is rather blood-y, Non Graphic Sex Scenes


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qDAPHv
